You are a necromancer with control over everything belonging in the afterlife.
reincarnation-origins.deathsworn.zombie_: You must first learn how to summon the Zombie
reincarnation-origins.deathsworn.drowned: You must first learn how to summon the Drowned
reincarnation-origins.deathsworn.skeleto: You must first learn how to summon the Skeleton
reincarnation-origins.deathsworn.zombifi: You must first learn how to summon the Zombified Piglin
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/u: [Shift + Left-Click] a minion to extract it's Petrified Heart.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/c: Single out a mob for all of your minions to target.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/l: Every minion summoned costs you maximum hearts.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/e: Minions will pick gear from the ground to use.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/j: Mobs you summon will not attack you or other nearby players.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/n: Your SOUL bar regenerates slowly at night.
You deal much less damage in melee
Villagers refuse to trade with you.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/p: Extract the Petrified Hearts of mobs you slay, containing their vital data. Your replicas are imperfect, coming out in various sizes.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/s: [Save Toolbar Activator] You can fire a ray of dark energy at will to deal light magic damage and set your minions on the targeted enemy.
You use SOUL energy for your rituals, absorb SOUL from enemies you slay.
Sacrifice your vitality to unleash a special ability of all your minions within 8 blocks. You will receive a book detailing each. Requires your SOUL to be higher than 50%, but doesn't consume SOUL.
At the cost of your SOUL energy and maximum health, right-click with a Petrified Heart to summon its bound mob to serve you.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/t: When at least 2 minions are nearby, they will sacrifice themselves to protect you from a fatal hit, dying to do so.
power.reincarnation-origins.deathsworn/r: Recall all of your minions, instantly teleporting them to you.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.brute: Summon a Piglin Brute in the overworld. Submit! will now deal even more damage.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.immor: Reclaim your life-force from nearby minions, preventing your death.
Let your minion score a kill.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.petri: Obtain your first petrified heart from a hostile mob.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.skele: The Path of Bone is all about skeletons, generally more damage-focused range oriented summons. Summon a generic Skeleton to get started.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.stray: Summon a Stray. These little guy's arrows pull entities towards them!
reincarnation-origins.advancements.zombi: The Path of Flesh is all about Zombies, generally more robust melee oriented summons. Summon a generic Zombie to get started.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.drown: The ultimate water Zombies, these little fellas swim like no other!
reincarnation-origins.advancements.might: He hooks your enemies and pulls them close! Obtained by slaying a Guardian.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.ancie: The Mighty Drowned is much slower and not as tanky as the drowned, but can throw the trident! Obtain by slaying an Elder Guardian.
They're kinda dry and crusty, but they give nearby enemies weakness, blindness, and wither when they're hit.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.zombi: They're a tank bruiser with decent damage. Enemies slain by this minion drop more loot.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.summo: The Path of Bone and the Path of Flesh, Raise minions from either one!
reincarnation-origins.advancements.withe: They're excellent bruisers, capable of both taking and dishing out damage in melee. Though they are weak to ranged damage.
